评论概述: Great Sweatshirt!  Beautiful color. Mostly cotton!
评论详情: This is the prettiest dusty blue color!! It's the same color as my hubby’s eyes! The mostly cotton fabric is substantial enough to be warm. I read the previous reviews that stated these shirts ran small, so I ordered a size larger. I'm glad I did. It fits perfectly. Very happy Amazon customers.

Ordered one in black. That sucker instantly lightened in one wash. It held some oil that got on it after 4 washes oil stain has not faded. With my carhart sweat shirts, I don’t have this issue with oil. I just wasted $30 bucks.  They are heavy weight, and warm. Fits to size. I actually like the fit a little more.
This sweater is not this color green at all its more like a dull light green color . Would not recommend buying at all .

评论概述: It's been washed once and it is pilling already
评论详情: Pretty basic review.. This sweatshirt was worn 3 times, washed once inside out, dryer on low for about 15 min then hang dry. Once I checked it after being dry, it was pilling up pretty badly. Pretty disappointing and feels like a cheap throwaway sweater, unfortunately. Only redeeming star is for fit.. It actually fit pretty comfortably and true to size.
Great quality, nice thick material, it's warm, soft, and true to size chart. The color is nice and looks exactly like the pic.

The hoodie was actually better than I thought it would be. I work outside so it works great for me. It’s thicker than all of the hoodies I already had. I’m ordering another one today.

I had originally bought myself one for work last winter and gotta say worked amazing! Kept me warm and stood up to the test of construction. But recently I had bought two more and gotta say was NOT disappointed!!! I loved them so much so my wife and kids had to try it on. Safe to say our whole family has them now!!! Please don’t change a thing about your hoodies!!!
on the small side ,im 5’9 150lbs and the large fits me perfect.. a tad snug to my liking.. but I prefer my hoodies with extra space so next time I’ll order XL

In an effort to replace a 10 year old hoodie, I found my nearly identical replacement. I have no doubt this will last me just as long. Unlike the leading brands, the cuffs and hems are of high quality and good weight. The blend of fabric wears down gently over time turning in to a lighter sweatshirt perfect for everyday use. This fits a little larger initially but that means it will wear in nicely!

Pockets are great, overall feel and weight of the sweater is great. Arms are a little short and when lifting my arms, my midriff is shown. Bought this for working outside and it is extremely uncomfortable having my belly and back uncovered.
Love the color, love the fit, and it’s one of my new favorites!
Took reviews advice and sized up but did not need to. I love this hoody I will be buying more,  just in the right size this time! Thankfully it will fit the husband.
Love that is it thick, (heavy duty) as advertised,  comfortable,  and the color looks great
Material looks good but sleeves were too short

I've had it since Jan 29th of 2023, washed it only a couple of times, only been air dried and the pilling started after a few weeks. The photo almost just makes it look like it's got a texture but the poor thing is absolutely coated. Apologies for the state of that mirror..

Great value for the price; everything else in this weight class is double the price. The only thing I didn't like is that some of the seams are not finished. They don't impact the wearability by any means, just look a little rough after a few washes.

True to size, fit perfect, may have shrank a little but very fitting!

Nice thick hoodie after the first wash.  Easily as heavy as some other "work" brands sold in your local farm and ranch stores. "Vintage black" is a dark charcoal, almost black.  Minimal shrinkage with the first wash in cool water, just a nice thickening of the fabric.  Contrary to some other reviews, I had no loose seams or threads, and edges of seams seemed to be well finished.
Nice hoodies but sized small. Would try again

i did get a small ,however, it was not heavy regardless
Bought for my husband and it fits perfect

I’m not sure who does the descriptions on these hoodies but the ash grey looks white on here, in person is a really light pale grey . Not the end of the world , but they definitely RUN SMALL. I wear a 3XL, I light my sweatshirts or hoodies to be loose and comfortable. A true 3XL does just that , but this one is actually kind of tight , also strands on thread coming out of every seem , oddly enough I like the rough edge look . If only it were bigger or true to size , this shirt would be amazing for the price . But I’m not to happy with it at all. I would suggest to try it on before buying if given that option…
I bought this hoodie twice. Really good quality material comfortable but the stitches are already coming out before you even put it on I have to get a scissor to cut it but besides that I like it

评论概述: NOT *Super Heavyweight* and neck hole is tiny
评论详情: I am a petite, 115' woman so got the men's small.  Neck hole is so very tight it is uncomfortable to pull over my head and feels too restrictive when wearing.  This is a nice light-weight material, but certainly nowhere near heavyweight, much less *SUPER* heavyweight.

Buyers are reporting that the thread is coming loose. The threads are fine, it's the soft fleece material that is pulling loose. To fix this you need Fray-Stop or something like it. This dries soft and keeps the fleece from peeling loose. These are heavy and will definitely keep my nephew warm. They are well made other than the soft fleece inside liner should habe been switched to keep from fraying. The Fray-Stop is an easy fix.
Hoodie looks and feels great but there really isn’t anything heavyweight about it. Bought it because I needed something durable and this isn’t it.

评论概述: Thick, warm, and a nice color
评论详情: Thick and warm in a very nice color. Gave as a gift to my brother in law who works outside.

Great sweatshirt. Nice and thick.  I see some complaints about stitch quality. Disregard those reviews. Zoom in on the top of the front pocket. Threads everywhere. It is a STYLE. It still holds together exceptionally well. It is just for looks. It would be like writing a complaint over jeans arriving with holes in them, when they are explicitly designed with holes.  Quality is great, sizing is great. Very warm and durable. Affordable compared to the bigger name brands at this quality.

Purchase for son-in-law for Christmas. He absolutely loved it and would not take it off! Fit as expected and very soft to the touch.

Not thick, just your average sweatshirt material. Roomy in the arm pits, which my husband loves. Seams have that unfinished, tattered look, which surprised us and we don't care for. Good enough for a work sweatshirt, but not "heavy" at all, like we'd hoped for. Color is true to Amazon photos, my photo doesn't depict the color accurately.
